projects.title: SyntaxHut – LeetCode Solutions Platform
projects.description: A backend-focused platform hosting 1400+ curated LeetCode solutions across multiple languages with automated ingestion, SEO optimization, and global deployment.
features: Automated content ingestion via GitHub Actions + Gemini AI
Secure backend APIs for solutions and contact handling
Deployment on Vercel with Cloudflare CDN

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A secure backend system for managing library operations with JWT authentication, role-based access, and automated workflows for books and members.
features: Book management: add, update, delete, search, availability tracking
Member management and borrowing/return workflows with overdue fines
Extra features: book recommendations, request system, audit trail, notifications
Robust error handling, validation, and unit/integration testing

projects.title: LeetSolution – Problem Management Platform
projects.description: A scalable, automated platform for managing 1500+ coding problems and solutions, with AI-driven enrichment, multi-language support, and CI/CD pipelines for synchronization across backend and frontend.
features: Automated data pipeline with scheduled GitHub Actions
Problem metadata management (title, difficulty, topics, etc.)
AI-based content enrichment using Gemini API
Multi-language solution support: Python, Java, C++, C
Frontend synchronization via secure SSH + GitHub Actions
Designed scalable REST API endpoints for search/retrieval
Efficient large dataset handling with caching & batch processing
Secret management for API keys and deploy credentials

projects.title: Digital Detox
projects.description: A productivity and wellness app that helps users track and reduce their digital device usage. Features daily/weekly analytics, goal setting, and motivational insights to encourage healthy screen habits.

projects.title: Personal Finance Visualizer
projects.description: A modern web app to visualize and analyze your personal finances. Import transactions, categorize spending, and get beautiful interactive charts for budgeting and financial planning.

projects.title: LeetCode Hint Genie
projects.description: A sleek, AI-powered Chrome extension that provides instant hints and solutions for LeetCode problems. Features smart problem detection, AI-powered assistance with hints and solutions, and a beautiful glassmorphism UI design.

projects.title: Medica - Hospital Management System
projects.description: A full-stack hospital management and appointment booking platform built with the MERN stack. Provides a seamless experience for patients, doctors, and administrators with appointment scheduling, test booking, medical records, and authentication.

projects.title: AI-powered Virtual Development Pod
projects.description: An end-to-end, multi-agent software development automation platform that simulates real-world project lifecycle with specialized AI agents for Business Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Security, and Performance Optimization.

projects.title: AI Career Companion with Proctored Mock Interview
projects.description: A comprehensive Streamlit application for job seekers featuring automated job hunting, resume generation, and voice-based mock interviews with proctoring capabilities.

projects.title: MERN E-commerce Platform 2024
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application with comprehensive features including user authentication, payment integration, admin dashboard, and responsive design.

projects.title: Smart Clinic Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive backend system for managing clinics with JWT authentication, multiple user roles, and hybrid database architecture using both MySQL and MongoDB.

projects.title: MERN Job Portal
projects.description: A modern job portal with Firebase authentication, advanced filtering, and separate interfaces for job seekers and employers with real-time job posting and management.
